name: Air Apparent
overview: You are an experimental aircraft test pilot in the Kingdom of Elicor. Your unit were hosting a visit of the heir to the throne when the call came through - the elderly Queen of Elicor has died of natural causes, and the forces of the evil Prince L'thargy have descended upon Coranon Palace,to place his rotten posterior upon the throne. As enemy forces attack the airfield, you take off in your prototype helicopter, with none other than the true Heir Apparent onboard. Soon after, you realise - yours was the only aircraft that made it out intact.
